title: Help Neighbors in Need
content:
When Portland Rescue Mission hits capacity for overnight shelter, COVID CARE KITS are made available including a warm blanket, nutritious meal, clean clothes, and health and hygiene supplies

For many people, thatâ€™s enough to spark hope for a better life. With your gift today, people who are struggling can start a new life in our wide range of recovery programs.

Please help as many people as possible with a generous gift today.
